structure.unit: ARTICLE XVIII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY REMETERING ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 8A-395. Private cause of action.
Any person who suffers a loss as a result of a violation of any of the provisions of this article, any lawful order of the Director, any cease and desist order or notice to correct a violation issued by the Director or any assurance of compliance entered into pursuant to of the code and this article, may recover compensatory damages, punitive damages, attorney's fees and court costs as allowed by law from the person committing such violation. Nothing herein shall be construed to require the Director to bring any such action on behalf of a private person.
